sense.gloss: show, display, pretensions, appearances, ostentation, vanity
to get, to acquire, to obtain, to procure, to earn, to win, to gain, to secure, to attain
to get, to earn, to acquire, to procure, to gain, to secure, to attain, to obtain, to win
to receive something undesirable (e.g. a punishment), to get (ill)
understanding, satisfaction (e.g. with an explanation), being convinced
worth, merit, value, good point, strong point, redeeming feature, saving grace
obtaining (a qualification, right, object, etc.), acquisition (of land, property, etc.), gaining possession (of), getting, purchase
one's strong point, one's forte, one's specialty

sdata.j: ↑努力↑↓どりょく↓なくしては↑何↑↓なに↓も↑得↑↓え↓られない。
↑鍵↑↓かぎ↓となる↑問題↑↓もんだい↓は↑何↑↓なに↓を↑得↑↓え↓ることができるかではなく、↑何↑↓なに↓を↑失↑↓うしな↓わなければならないかである。
sdata.e: The key question is not what can I gain but what do I have to lose.

sdata.j: ↑誤解↑↓ごかい↓され↑得↑↓え↓るものはいずれすべて↑誤解↑↓ごかい↓されるであろう。
sdata.e: Anything that can be misunderstood will be.

sdata.j: われらは↑教皇↑↓きょうこう↓を↑得↑↓え↓た。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑評論↑↓ひょうろん↓は↑問題↑↓もんだい↓の↑表面↑↓ひょうめん↓↑的↑↓てき↓な↑分析↑↓ぶんせき↓↑結果↑↓けっか↓を↑取↑↓と↓り↑上↑↓あ↓げていただけだったのでクラスで↑最↑↓さい↓↑上位↑↓じょうい↓の↑成績↑↓せいせき↓を↑得↑↓え↓たことにとても↑驚↑↓おどろ↓いた。
sdata.e: His essay gave only a superficial analysis of the problem, so it was a real surprise to him when he got the highest grade in the class.

sdata.j: コミュニケーションなしに↑進展↑↓しんてん↓はあり↑得↑↓え↓ない。
sdata.e: There cannot be progress without communication.

sdata.j: ↑人生↑↓じんせい↓の↑後半↑↓こうはん↓というのは、ただ↑前半↑↓ぜんはん↓に↑会得↑↓えとく↓した↑習慣↑↓しゅうかん↓だけで↑成↑↓な↓り↑立↑↓た↓っているのさ。
sdata.e: The second half of a man's life is made up of nothing but the habits he has acquired during the first half.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑全然↑↓ぜんぜん↓↑納得↑↓なっとく↓していない。
↑朝起↑↓あさお↓きは↑三↑↓さん↓↑文↑↓もん↓の↑得↑↓とく↓。
sdata.e: The early bird catches the worm.

words.gloss: show, display, pretensions, appearances, ostentation, vanity
